DOC.brief_title: In Situ Caries Model Fluoride Toothpastes
DOC.criteria: Consent : Demonstrates understand study willingness participate evidence voluntary write informed consent receive sign date copy inform consent form Age : Aged 18 80 year inclusive Compliance : Understands willing , able likely comply study procedure restriction General Health : Good general health ( opinion investigator ) clinically significant and/or relevant abnormalities medical history oral examination could interfere subject safety study period Residency : Currently live Indianapolis , Indiana area Dentures : ) Currently wear removable mandibular partial denture sufficient room posterior buccal flange area accommodate two enamel specimen ( require dimension 12 x 7 millimeter ( mm ) . b ) Willing capable wear removable partial denture 24 hour per day two week treatment period . c ) All restoration good state repair Salivary Flow : Have salivary flow rate range normal value ( unstimulated whole saliva flow rate ≥ 0.2 mL/minute ; gum base stimulate whole saliva flow rate ≥ 0.8 mL/minute ) . Pregnancy : Women know pregnant intend become pregnant duration study Breastfeeding : Women breastfeed Allergy/Intolerance : Known suspected intolerance hypersensitivity study material ( closely relate compound ) state ingredient Clinical Study/Experimental Medication : . Participation another clinical study receipt investigational drug within 30 day first treatment visit , exception study GSK dental study wash period prior treatment sufficient . b . Previous participation study Antibiotics : Currently take antibiotic take antibiotic two week prior screen visit Fluoride : Prescribed professionally recommend use fluoride supplement fluoride mouthrinse Substance abuse : Recent history ( within last year ) alcohol substance abuse Dental Health : Current active caries periodontal disease may compromise study health subject Personnel : . A member site study staff directly work project live staff 's household . b . An employee sponsor c. Any employee toothpaste manufacturer spouse family member
